alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Dickens; Garza; Kent (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:12PM CDT until June 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR KENT...SOUTHERN DICKENS...GARZA AND SOUTHEASTERN CROSBY COUNTIES... At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Dickens to 3 miles east of Justiceburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Post, Spur, Dickens, Lake Alan Henry, White River Lake, Kalgary, Girard, Justiceburg and Clairemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Alan Henry, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
